DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Primary objective present study compare single dose bioavailability Torrent 's Rabeprazole Sodium Delayed Release Tablets 20 mg AciphexÂ® Delayed Release Tablets 20 mg ( Reference , Eisai Inc. , USA ) . Dosing period separate washout period fast study . Study Design : Open-Label , Randomised , two Period , two treatment , Crossover , Single-Dose Bioequivalence Study
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Torrent Pharmaceutical Ltd. 's Rabeprazole Sodium Delayed Release Tablets Under Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy male human volunteer within age range 18 50 year A body mass index within 1825 Kg/m2 Given write informed consent participate study Absence Of disease marker HIV 1 & 2 , hepatitis B & C virus RPR . Absence significant disease clinically ' significant abnormal laboratory value laboratory evaluation , medical history medical examination screen A normal 12 lead ECG . A normal chest Xray ( FA view ) Comprehension nature purpose'of study compliance requirement entire protocol No history evidence hypersensitivity rabeprazole substitute benzimidazoles component formulation No history Anaphylaxis arid Angioedema No history presence gastric malignancy No history significant systemic diseases No history psychiatric disorder No history addiction recreational drug drug dependence No donation blood ( one unit 350 mL ) within 90 day prior study checkin No participation clinical study within last 90 day No receipt prescription drug overthecounter drug ( e.g . : Cold preparation , antacid preparation ' vitamin natural product use therapeutic benefit ) , within two week prior study checkin No history dehydration diarrhea , vomit reason within period 24.0 hour prior study checkin No family history neurological disorder Not consume alcohol xanthin contain food beverage , ( chocolate , tea , coffee cola drink ) cigarettes tobacco product least 48.0 hour prior study checkin period . Negative result drug abuse ( Benzodiazepines , Cocaines , Opioids , Amphetamines , Cannabinoids Barbiturates ) urine day study checkin period Not consume grapefruit ( mosumbi/sweet lime ) juice within 48.0 hour prior study checkin Negative alcohol breath analysis study checkin period History seizures Received pharmacological agent know significantly induce inhibit drug metabolize enzyme within 14 day start study History alcohol consumption two units/day ( 1 unit=30 mL spirit/or 1 pint beer ) , consume alcohol within 48.0 hour prior checkin High caffeine ( 5 cup coffee tea/day ) tobacco ( mote 9 cigarettes/beedies/cigars per day ) consumption History difficulty donate blood difficulty accessibility vein An unusual abnormal diet whatever reason e.g . fast due religious reason
